original_text: But the Lord always does what he has promised. So he will help you to be strong inside yourselves. He will keep you safe when Satan attacks you.
korean_text: 주는 미쁘사 너희를 굳건하게 하시고 악한 자에게서 지키시리라

sentences.original_text: But the Lord always does what he has promised.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 주님은 항상 약속하신 것을 행하십니다.

sentences.original_text: So he will help you to be strong inside yourselves.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 그분은 여러분이 내면에서 강해지도록 도우실 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: He will keep you safe when Satan attacks you.
sentences.korean_translation: 사탄이 여러분을 공격할 때 그분이 여러분을 지켜주실 것입니다.
